Welcome to the amazing 1.5 beta release of Revival. This is the most expansive update to the game yet including these major features: * Stonehenge and Abyss Armor & Weapons including original names & stats. * 6x Stonehenge Helms, 3x Abyss Armor Sets * Sunblade, Sunshield, Moonblade, Gleamcarver, Dissector, Dissector Shield * Vigilante, Hellbore, Fry Baby, Core Magnum, Thumper, Thunderclash * Fire Seeds, Negatron, Singularity Node, 3x Focus Items (yes, including Slippies!) * Particle updates from Abyss. * Background environment updates from Abyss. * Map nodes more clearly defined. * Widened streets. * Improved architecture and enchanced geometrical detail. * * New community item loots! * 16x new unique items named after hellgateaus community members. * Mythic & Double-Edged qualities. * New minigame events. When winning the minigame, you may be lucky enough to proc: * Palladium. * Fawkes items. * Mods. * Debuffs. * Rings added to the game. * 1x slot for goggles & 2x slots added for your rings . * Passgeways are rarer but richer. * Rare and boss mobs are a lot more challenging and have fixed chances of dropping exceptional loot. * Players are rewarded with a skill & attribute retrainer upon the completion of the game (norm & nm). * Major bosses have a fixed chance of drop retrainers. * Moloch has been added as a rare spawn to the hell dungeon and drops original stonehenge loot. * A number of quest rewards have been reworked. * Improved dye kit colors. * New loader screen art work from the Abyss expansion. * Nanoforge increaments are larger. -something coldheart wrote into a post * Pets only drop from certain fixed bosses. * Only legendary and rarer items require identifying. * Nightmare mode levels scale to your character level (excluding end game). * Pets drop as eggs and need to be used in the cube. * Old bosses can be fought again. * Slightly better chance of finding uniques in general. * Obtain genre specific mods from certain enemies. ie. Get beast multiplier mods from beast type mobs. * Zomper, the Bill Roper zombie is now a unique spawn and carries IOU's. * Blue prints only craft exceptional items that require a lot of parts. * Mods no longer show up on weapons ? * None stat boosting dye kits rare drops from monsters. * Fix end game level advancement. * XP penalty removed for fighting monsters above your level.. in fact you level faster. * Stonehenge bosses added to end game quests, replayable. * Better lifetime on modifications. * Starting point removed. Murmur gives you skills points to advance you. * Tutorial dialogue can be skipped. * Monster shield overload capacity capped at 100%. * Power regeneration increase from 120 to 480. * Reduced power regen per Willpower from 3 to 2. * Monster/platyer shield charge delay reduced from 4 to 2.5 seconds. * Shield recharge rate from from 5% to 10%. * Fix reaper model. * Change basic crafting progressions. * I'm not sure if I'm in the right place, but can I make a suggestion? It regards the Transmorg. Cube and crafting.
* Lower environment visability
Early game: * Start with no weapons in tutorial. * Get a choice of weapon for your first quest.
Class changes: General: * Sprint maxes at 3 points and has no cooldown. * Skills rearranged into their groups.
Templar: * Multiple auras can be used at once at the expense of mana pool.
Engineer: * Haste bot dependency removed. *
Optional components: * Allow purchasing of retrainers. * Removal of regional censoring. * Automatically pickup basic items. * Malachor's Sniper Pack. * "Hell" mode difficulty. * Tabbed inventory.
Previous fixes included: * Increased stash (x10) and inventory (2x). * Level cap increased to 55. * Destructables only drop basic items. * Mutant boss loots are fixed drops and scale. * Vendor will sometimes offer legendary mods.
Brand new game experience. Although you can play your higher level characters, we would recommend starting a new one so you can reep the full benefits update.
